alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Northern Phillips (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 5:48PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Phillips County through 645 PM MDT... At 547 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northwest of Malta, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Malta, Saco, Bowdoin, Sleeping Buffalo, Wagner and Content. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Phillips; Northern Phillips
